# episcrap

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `episcrap` is to scrape some data for my epidemiological studies.

## Installation

You can install the development version of episcrap from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("denis-or/episcrap")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to get the vaccine data:

```{r example}
# library(episcrap)
# basic example code
# banco_vacina_municipios <- get_data_vaccine()
# View(banco_vacina_municipios)
```
